Content: Arrangements made by the 57 Division Headquarters in Kilinochchi, following guidelines given by Major General Niyshshanka Ranawana, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi (SF-KLN) enabled more than 100 Officers of 57, 65, 66 Divisions and the Forward Maintenance Area to learn more about ‘Transitional Justice & Its Global Impact’ on Saturday (8) at the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) premises. Dr Dayani Sumithra Panagoda and her team of lectures of the Bandaranaike Center for International Studies (BCIS) delivered lectures to this effect covering all aspects of this important perspective. Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division and several Senior Officers were associated with the event.
